mapper.select: select ctno, ctname, ctage, ctaddress, ctphone, ctemail, ctpw from caretaker where ctdelete = false order by ctno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(ctno) from caretaker where ctno > 0
mapper.delete: update caretaker set ctdelete = true where ctno = #{ctno}
mapper.update: update caretaker set ctname = #{dto.ctname}, ctage = #{dto.ctage}, ctaddress = #{dto.ctaddress}, ctphone = #{dto.ctphone} where ctno = #{ctno}
